name: The Prophecy
description:
Help Jacob, an average medieval boy, on his quest of saving the kingdom from dark prophecy.

Meet 2D pixel-art Point&Click adventure inspired by the best retro games of 90-s!
Welcome to the peaceful medieval village, where life is good and quiet. But one night all changes!
Jacob, average medieval boy, finds himself in the midst of whirlpool of magical events. Now the fate of his village (and whole kingdom) depends on him!

- Help Jacob on his quest of saving the kingdom from dark prophecy!
- Explore environment and find solutions to move plot forward!
- Discover new items and places!
- Enjoy beautiful pixel-art locations!

Featuring:
- Dialogues!
- "Look at/Use/Talk to" interactions!
- Dark prophecy and magic!

Welcome and have a nice time in the world of "The Prophecy"!
